constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 52 (Friday, March 19, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. TENNEY:
H.R. 2114.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 1 of the United States Constitution,
providing--``All legislative Powers herein granted shall be
vested in a Congress of the United States, which shall
consist of a Senate and House of Representative''.
[Page H1613]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Essential Caregivers Act of 2021
